name: Deterrabbit
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2017

Endless flyer, horizontal side scroller that features Bubbles, the detergent-addict rabbit, who swings in a world of waves. With only the use of the space bar, you will decrease Bubble's oscillation frequency so he can proceed with his psychedelic trip, while he dodges the dangerous enemies that he'll find along the way. Grab power ups, avoid barb wires, carrots and lettuces unless you have the invincibility shield.

Credits: Mery Bonjour (Art) /Sebastián Garcia (Art)/ Nicolás Almada ( Art) /Giselle Ruiz (Production)/ Enzo Gaiero (Programming) /Santiago Ramos(Music/SFX) /Joint game design.
